question: Which country Pays Tribute To J Dalmiya With Book 'A Tribute To Jagu'?
explanation: Sri Lanka Cricket (SLC) has released the book named 'A Tribute to Jagu' as a tribute to former BCCI President Jagmohan Dalmiya. This book has been compiled by SLC as a commemoration of Jagmohan Dalmiya's contributions to cricket. They honoured him posthumously as the greatest non-Sri Lankan contributor to Sri Lankan cricket. Avishek, son of Jagmohan Dalmiya, who is the joint secretary of the Cricket Association of Bengal (CAB) received the book.
